3. Hard Anodised Pressure Cookers are made from a special Aluminium Alloy which is very Strong Hard Anodising Treatment makes the aluminium Hardness equalant to the hardness of Sapphire Crytal i.e. around 2.40 Times Stronger than Steel. Products made in hard Anodised are far more reliable and sturdy than normal Aluminium Life span is also almost double and they are also Metal Spoon Friendly.

8. Material: The Entire Pressure Cooker has been Made from Food Grade Virgin ISI Grade raw material to ensure consistency in quality and the best product every time.
9. Spare Parts: All the spare parts of the pressure cooker are ISI marked and readily available in special retail box packaging for sale.

column17:
Sapphire is mainly into Supplies of Pressure cookers to around 15 top brands of India and has developed a product which is much much heavier and better than any available product in the market.
1. Thickness: Extra Heavy Gauge ISI Marked Pressure Cooker.
2. Energy Saver Base: All Sapphire Products come with a Energy Saver base which ensures that you save upto 32% of precious Fuel every time you cook for your loved ones.
3. Hard Anodised Pressure Cookers are made from a special Aluminium Alloy which is very Strong Hard Anodising Treatment makes the aluminium Hardness equalant to the hardness of Sapphire Crytal i.e. around 2.40 Times Stronger than Steel. Products made in hard Anodised are far more reliable and sturdy than normal Aluminium Life span is also almost double and they are also Metal Spoon Friendly.
4. Parts: All Parts of the Sapphire Gold Pressure Cooker are as per The ISI specifications.
5. Handles: Extra Light weight heat resistance phenolic resin Bakelite handles.
6. Vent Tube: Complete Stainless Steel Vent Tube add up to the overall life of the pressure cooker and vent weight and it will not have to be changed again and again.
7. Stainless Steel Accessories: The Main bracket back handle clip and locking loops are of complete Stainless steel and are life long and need not be changed ever.
8. Material: The Entire Pressure Cooker has been Made from Food Grade Virgin ISI Grade raw material to ensure consistency in quality and the best product every time.
9. Spare Parts: All the spare parts of the pressure cooker are ISI marked and readily available in special retail box packaging for sale.
10. Best in its Class: Technically and aesthetically we have tried our level best to make Sapphire Gold Pressure Cooker the best Pressure Cooker Available in the market.
11. Extra long life because of Heavier Base and Rims.
